long_description: The women's Chaco ReversiFlip Flip-Flops feature interchangeable and reversible upper straps, so you can pick the pattern to match your style. Comfortable footbeds keep your feet happy all day long. Synthetic leather uppers allow quick-change updates to different straps with different colors and designs; soft synthetic lining. Interchangeable straps for the Chaco ReversiFlip Flip-Flops are available in 3 sets and 12 color options (not included). Nonmarking EcoTread outsoles are made with 25% recycled content. River- and boulder-inspired design on footbeds for traction and comfort. American Podiatric Medical Association-certified LUVSEAT(TM) footbeds provide legendary Chaco comfort and support.
short_description: The women's Chaco ReversiFlip Flip-Flops feature interchangeable and reversible upper straps, so you can pick the pattern to match your style. Comfortable footbeds keep your feet happy all day long.
